website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking to maximize your TV dollar and don't care about 4K, it's tough to go wrong with the Vizio E series.
pros: The Vizio E series TVs with local dimming deliver very good picture quality for an affordable price
The image evinces deep black levels with little blooming, accurate color and great bright-room performance, and it provides for plenty of adjustments
The Smart TV component has plenty of apps and a simple interface, and the TV's exterior is discreet and minimalist
cons: Dimmer highlights than some more expensive TVs

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Expected.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a refurbished unit, but the only difference between the item and a new one is the lack of a commercial box. This set lives up to my every expectation of Vizio sets. I have six in my home now. I have no negative observations.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Chandler

customer_reviews.title: used
customer_reviews.text: thats what i get for being chep and greedy. refurbished it is. first one one bad replaced it wit another one and it was an apple from apple
customer_reviews.author: vex

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product for the price. Although we ran into a little "snafu" on the shipping it was still a very good transaction. Color and Clarity are very good, however we found it to be a HUGE improvement by adding a soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Peter N Colangelo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price. No regrets. Have 3 in various sizes through out the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ty8541

customer_reviews.title: Best TV
customer_reviews.text: Video Television is all we ever had! Consumers Guide ranks it #2. I rank it #1
customer_reviews.author: MJDoe

customer_reviews.title: TV all around good, picture quality and sound are great
customer_reviews.text: TV all around good, picture quality and sound are great! The shipping department did a great job in packaging this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV so far! I've only have it a couple months but the picture is clear and crisp. No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: J.Fish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  choice
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I've always had good luck with Vizio. Easy to install, picture very clear and delivery was sooner than expected. I will definitely shop with this company again. Marge Verderber
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the picture and the sound is decent
customer_reviews.text: This was particular item. It is very sensitive. Beware that if the box is damaged mostly likely it will not work. It took 3 times before I received one that worked. The vendor worked with me patiently until the issue was resolved. I like the picture and the sound is decent. I would have like more connection types especially more av options. However, for the price over all and experience with the unit I say I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Easy Assemble legs, fast delivery! Looks great! very light weight. Love it. Menu options are user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: me2013

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are weak, but I guess if you are ...
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are weak, but I guess if you are trying to make TV's as narrow/thin as possible this is bound to happen.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Love it no wishing I could watch movies like everyone
customer_reviews.text: We love them I have had one issue with mine not wanting to allow the uverse remote to turn the TV.
customer_reviews.author: HeRB

customer_reviews.title: Awsome !!
customer_reviews.text: This 📺 is awesome for the price. Easy to set up set up in less than 10 mins. And the Amazon prime, Netflix and Pandora are great and very easy to use from the remote woyh the three designated buttons. Set up to internet in seconds. Love 💘 love
customer_reviews.author: kimberly jones

customer_reviews.title: easy hook-up. What else could anyone ask for
customer_reviews.text: Clear picture, easy hook-up. What else could anyone ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Michael_me

customer_reviews.title: and several web reveiws the vizio was the best in price
customer_reviews.text: Yes I did do my home work! after reading reviews from cnet ext, and several web reveiws the vizio was the best in price! and I also looked at other brands that cost hundreds more. little if any diferance in picture quality! great tv!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Moore

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great picture, but you really need a sound bar with this as it sounds tinny.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had any problems good tv for the price
customer_reviews.text: I brought this tv a couple months ago. Haven't had any problems good tv for the price.... Buy this tv its worth it... A year later the Paneling went out thank God I have Square trade they are replacing this TV
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for many shows, but latency is a problem for sports.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: It's really nice having my laptop back after the kids hit it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice having my laptop back after the kids hit it with a baseball bat, very easy to install too, the price was fair!
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: New tv worked less than 2 hours!
customer_reviews.text: Received TV on date scheduled 8-17, installed it about a week later. Used it a couple times for a few intestinal just to set up. Today I sat down to watch a couple shows, after 30-40 minutes heard loud pop then hiss and TV shut down Very disappointed!!! Hopefully seller will stand behind it. I'll update after I hear back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pickens

customer_reviews.title: 00 for a TV that now needs to be replaced because it is pretty much unwatchable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this TV for less than two years. It has been gently used for gaming and watching TV and has never been moved, save from the day it was set up. After less than two years, the backlight is no longer working and the screen is so dark that my wife and I need to keep the lights in our living room off to actually have any kind of clarity with the screen. I am extremely pissed off, as we paid about $800.00 for a TV that now needs to be replaced because it is pretty much unwatchable. I will never, ever buy a vizio product again.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Bought from Best Buy. the E600-i-B3
customer_reviews.text: It is only 13 months old. Bought from Best Buy. the E600-i-B3. after 13 months, a black cloud, about the size of a fireplace log, is covering the top right corner of the screen. So irritating and all Vizio says is "too bad, you are out of warranty but let us help you buy a new TV". Never again will I buy a Vizio product.
customer_reviews.author: Surfkitten

customer_reviews.title: you like watching a picture that has a big square like ...
customer_reviews.text: Everybody writes their reviews straight out of the box but I am reviewing this Vizio after 1 year & 7 months. It is not repairable. So you must buy the extended warranty. The screen is not replaceable and it can't be fixed. So $800 out the window. Unless, you like watching a picture that has a big square like a dark shadow on it. This is just a rip off when a company makes a product so badly that it doesn't even last 2 years. I had a Vizio before and sold it when I moved so I bought another one for this house, but never again.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy.
customer_reviews.text: this TV only came out in 2015 and we purchased it several months later so it is not an old TV. However, it is dying a slow death with the picture increasingly becoming black! I talked with their tech support and they said it is the back lighting and too difficult to repair so I should buy a new one. I expect a TV to last longer than this! Will NEVERR buy another Vizio. BTW, look it up on consumer Reports. It gets a 63 out of 100.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Mass Reported LED Failures-  Bad Quality even for the money
customer_reviews.text: Do your homework and search the internet for the widespread failure of the backlighting LEDs. Sure these panels are priced competitively, however, LED failure after 2 years is atrocious! I have a 10 year plus Hitachi Plasma that is still working! Aside from the LED failure the smart TV functions are really slow to load and navigate. The remote control is poorly designed with the battery cover easily sliding off. The remote also lags, meaning when you press the volume button it doesn't work right away. Sometimes you have to take the batteries out to get the remote to work responsively. This TV is one of my worst purchashing decisions in my life and I will never buy Vizio again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Cannot WATCH Amazon Prime on this TV.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Vizio 3 years ago and can watch Amazon Prime on it, but cannot watch on this new TV I am very disappointed that I can't watch Amazon prime on this so called "Smart TV" I won't ever buy or recommend Vizio to my friends or co-workers again. You would think Amazon and Vizio would have a better partnership. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased about 3 years ago via Walmart so ours has seemed to last longer than the other reviewers here... but our remote smart apps no longer work except Netflix, and we have across half the middle that infamous fading blacklight that just started about a month ago. At 800 bucks, we feel we didn't get our moneys worth and will be looking at other brands after this. Thanks while it lasted Vizio!
customer_reviews.author: A. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold  picture settings properly and has terrible noise in the dark blacks
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold picture settings properly and has terrible noise in the dark blacks. Also, HDMI's don't work with my computer. I have tried various picture custom settings and they all are drifting and unstable. Horrible TV!
customer_reviews.author: Chia-Pet

customer_reviews.title: Not bad so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tv about a year ago, everything works on the tv. The only complaints I have are the remote looks like it was made for a radio. The remote only has 11 buttons, luckily I watch amazons video service on the Xbox. If I had cable tv then I would have returned the tv. There is an app for the tv, suposedly you can control the tv with it. I'm not sure how though, it looks like a mix of a Netflix knockoff and a kinda tv control app.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Dark spots, Vizio won't warranty stay away
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 15 months ago. It now has a dark spot on the top left corner of the keeps getting worse. Vizio won't warranty it, and say it's not a common problem, but if you go online it is a very common problem-stay away from Visio, I for one am only doing Samsung and Sony from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: erich bastel

customer_reviews.title: Bought it in late 2015. Lasted one year and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in late 2015. Lasted one year and three months. LED back lights went out across the horizontal mid section. Two weeks later, more went out on lower left side. I have read many similar complaints of this nature, and it seems that this is very common to the Vizio LED TV's.
customer_reviews.author: wick ellerbe

customer_reviews.title: Junk, buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Absolute JUNK. Just out of warranty a horizontal 1/4 screen gray bar appeared and will not go away. I would suggest avoiding the Vizio brand completely. Purchased at Best Buy for $748.99.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TV is great, but does not work with Amazon Prime video
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Vizio 60" E60-E3 from another retailer, not Amazon. Almost everything about this TV is excellent - great picture and sound. I was concerned the sound wood be inadequate and I would need to purchase a sound bar, but the sound quality far exceeds my expectation. However, Vizio no longer supports the Amazon Prime video app - the only way to stream Amazon Prime video on this TV is if you purchase an Amazon Fire Stick or FireTV.
customer_reviews.author: Turd Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Look it up online; certain models (I own M60-C3) will either break or their screens will show dark regions/spots conveniently JUST after warranty expires. Not a durable good, spend the extra $100 and get a TV that will work for the next 5 years, with good warranty and technical support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK TV, broke in < 2 years and Vizio wont replace
customer_reviews.text: Decent price, mediocre picture, slow apps. Less than 2 years from purchase and the screen now has a dark area covering about 20% of screen (backlight). After researching, found out this is a known issue by Vizio on other models. Contacted support and they refused to replace the product saying it did not qualify for extended manufacturers warranty like other models. First and last Vizio product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: The LED panel broke within 2 weeks of normal use ...
customer_reviews.text: The LED panel broke within 2 weeks of normal use. After a month-long journey though Vizio customer service, I still do not have a working TV. They seem to have quality control issues and customer service is clearly overloaded. I would avoid Vizio at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: AdamVO

customer_reviews.title: Vizio is one of the WORST electronic products ever made
customer_reviews.text: Vizio is one of the WORST electronic products ever made. I have three Vizio TV, two were sent back for not working properly. One came back to me physically broken although it was sent to Assurion for electronic issues. The second one was sent and I was told it cannot be fixed. You could NOT pay me to buy another Vizio product. Save your money and the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Dedicated Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Caution with Ethernet connection
customer_reviews.text: I have this tv for about 2 months. Great tv and easy hook up. However this TV is NOT compatible with Amazon prime streaming via an Ethernet cable. That is correct. Took me many hours on tech support to find that out. It will work with a wi if signal. Frankly that stinks since I need an Ethernet connection and am very irate. Same problem with an older Vizio that works just fine with a wifi on Netflix and Amazon. But no Ethernet on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Billybudd

customer_reviews.title: This product sucks had it for a year and the back plate ...
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks had it for a year and the back plate is going out and they claim to be number one yea right I would never recommend this product to any one this is the second time this has happened and conveniently goes to crap right when the warranty is up
customer_reviews.author: Tim Felton

customer_reviews.title: TV develop black square in upper left screen within a year of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this TV from Best buy a year ago. We have a nice black rectangle on the upper left side of the screen. I did but an extended warranty so we will see what the geek squad will do. I have never had a tv do this before. I am not sure if I would ever buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Garbage TV and company
customer_reviews.text: Have had 60" tv for about 14 months and the backlighting started going away. Called vizio like everybody else and they will not stand behind product one day after warranty is up. Do not buy this brand tv.
customer_reviews.author: Bodie Bedford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV, especially for the price!!...the colors are great and very clean picture quality...pretty dark blacks as well...the processor is very fast and has never had to "buffer" while watching Netflix...Overall, I'm very happy with this TV!!
customer_reviews.author: FastEddie33

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Same issue as everyone else... after a 19 months led finally went out it started way before but by the time we found out it was out of warranty..spoke to vizio...no help..wanted to sell me another model for $600 that had worse reviews then the one I had.. needs to be a recall or class action ....going back to samsung...
customer_reviews.author: asa

customer_reviews.title: No amazon prime on it
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get a lot of apps. Cannot use Amazon prime on it. We regret buying this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Who Dat

customer_reviews.title: ... 10 months old an already has a line of bad pixels and a 3"x12" rectangular block in the upper ...
customer_reviews.text: TV is less than 10 months old an already has a line of bad pixels and a 3"x12" rectangular block in the upper left that has darkened and turned greenish.
customer_reviews.author: Mudcat58

customer_reviews.title: vizio told me it sounds like you need to buy a new
customer_reviews.text: black spots in back lighting in barely one year. vizio told me it sounds like you need to buy a new one
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Brochu

customer_reviews.title: ... since the warranty is out so am I would recommend spending a little extra for a Samsung least they ...
customer_reviews.text: After one year of purchase a dark area appeared on the screen since the warranty is out so am I would recommend spending a little extra for a Samsung least they have a legit customer service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sports good/ kids like xbox games on it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV at Wal-Mart a month ago. Paid $750. Picture is good/ action movies, sports good/ kids like xbox games on it. Seems to do it all. Only complaint is speakers in the TV are bad on their own. I hooked up a LG sound bar and it sounds great now. Probably more me as I was used to the sound bar set up.
customer_reviews.author: MazeDog

customer_reviews.title: Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Loving it! I placed the order Thursday night 2/18 and received it Saturday noon 2/21! 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: YaYa

customer_reviews.title: based on CNET recommended settings, The color
customer_reviews.text: Completely blown away,!! I bought this TV refurbed for 450.00 shipped.After I calibrated it, based on CNET recommended settings, The color, contrast and tonality are just beautiful! Now, I don't understand the comments about bad sound, the sound on this TV, BLOWS ME AWAY! I highly recomened this TV!!
customer_reviews.author: Tandy J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV. Especially for the price. Picture definitely requires tweaking (like any TV) to get the best image. Out of the box, all the presets give you a lackluster picture. Smart TV apps are pretty lame, but its hard to expect a top of the line experience at this price point. If you have an Xbox or Playstation for streaming video, those definitely produce a superior experience. Great picture, great aesthetics (I love the two foot design), and an unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: StevoH

customer_reviews.title: Not if you want a TV to last more than 2yrs...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this TV summer 2013. It worked pretty well for ~2yrs until 4mo ago all the HDMI ports stopped working and then 4days ago it just suddenly stopped working all together- no picture, volume, NOTHING! It would've costed about $380.00 to repair per VIZIO support team. I wouldn't recommend this TV if you are looking for a TV to last over 2yrs.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: awful choice
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Loses wired connection constantly and requires constant resetting (and I'm an tech support guy so I what I'm talking about).
customer_reviews.author: William Brownville

customer_reviews.title: I have the prior version and can only say; ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the prior version and can only say; DO NOT BUY VIZIO Just after warranty, the tv began showing black horizontal lines. When I contacted their customer service- they referred me to a 3rd party repair service who explained over the phone that that the TV would need a whole new screen- which would cost as much as a new TV, AND that they could not replace. They referred me back to Vizio, who simply offered a $100 discount on another one of these. Fool me twice?... NO Thank you. This was my first and LAST Vizio purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hatziliadis

customer_reviews.title: Vizio needs to do a little more work on this tv
customer_reviews.text: Okay, we had the opportunity to check this TV out for a short period and out of the box, the colors just aren't as bright and on par with other models. The internet aps seem to work pretty good and most everything else. However, your tv is all about the picture, its why the tv was created so long ago. We suggest you check the model below out and go with a tv with many more reviews.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This TV ducks just stopped working only a year and a half old. Probably not worth fixing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sanchez

product_meta.title: VIZIO 60" Class (60.00"Diag.) Full-Array LED Smart TV
product_meta.description: The all-new 2015 E-Series 60" (60" diag.) Full-Array LED Smart TV has arrived. Featuring a new modern design, brilliant picture quality, and faster, easier-to-use smart TV experience, VIZIO's 2015 E-Series brings you premium HD entertainment at an incredible value. Full-Array LED backlighting and 12 Active LED Zones produce deeper black levels and brighter colors1 that makes all your favorite shows more vibrant and beautiful. VIZIO E-Series: Incredible picture, unbeatable value. 1Compared to previous generations of VIZIO E-Series TVs.
feature_bullets: Easy to Use Smart TV w/ built-in Wi-Fi
1080p Full HD - over 2 million pixels for crystal-clear pictures
Full-Array LED Backlight w/ 12 Active LED Zones
Clear Action 240 w/ 120Hz Effective Refresh Rate
Easy to Use Smart Remote with One-touch Access

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars111 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
